name: Bova Cubes™
description: Bova Cubes™ contain 100% dry distillers grains with soluble and are available in cubes. A patented process creates a hard distillers cube that won’t crumble. McNess Bova Cubes™ can be fed on the ground without high wastage or wind losses. A convenient, quality feed for cows, stockers or calves. Cubes are sourced out of Ord, NE

Product Families: Formulated Feeds, Whole Foods and Extracts
